name: exmerg
description: Lokale Webanwendung zum Mergen von Excel/ODS und ODG Dateien

scripts.dev: concurrently -n client,server -c blue,green "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:server"
scripts.dev:client: cross-env VITE_PROXY_TARGET=http://localhost:3004 npm run dev --prefix client
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix shared && npm run build --prefix server && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.test: npm run test:run --prefix client && npm run test --prefix server
